text: The 1947/48 NTFL season was the 27th season of the Northern Territory Football League (NTFL). Waratah have won their eighth premiership title while defeating the Buffaloes in the grand final by 13 points. ==Grand Final== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left;" |- style="background:#efefef;" ! Premiers ! GF Score ! Runner-up |- | Waratah | 9.8 (62) - 6.13 (49) | Buffaloes (Darwin) |} == References == Category:Northern Territory Football League seasons NTFL
title: 1947/48 NTFL season
